COSC A319 051 - Internet Technologies (Fall 2018)

I’m a software engineer, data scientist, data engineer, and educator.

I’ve worked in large commercial, startup, academic, government, and not-for-profit settings.

I’m always excited to discuss new ideas or projects and to share my experiences.
